content.description:
Start on the prominent cobble in the middle of the wall. Move to a LH and a RH pinch. Hop to the top.

Also one can make these into dyno moves.

It is an awesome, fun problem.
content.protection: This has a flat landing. Use 1-2 pads.
content.location:
This is in the small corridor on the boulder opposite of the

Organic Slab

.

From the parking lot, cross the stream, and head up past the "Bigger Girl Boulder" and straight back to the tucked away corridor.

content.description:
Just to the left of

Erotic States of Mind

, start on the lowest big cobble. Balance your way up on more cobbles, trending left towards the prow where there are even more cobbles.
content.location:
Just left of

Erotic States of Mind

, on the same boulder.

content.description: This is an absolute classic. Start on the good cobble at about chest height, and work your way up the slab with big moves between great cobbles.
content.location:
After crossing the creek, head uphill and left towards the giant boulder with

Erotic States of Mind

on it. walk around the right of this boulder and into the corridor of sorts behind it. Organic is the tall slab just uphill to the right with the huge, obvious cobbles.

content.description:
Starting from the lowest right hold, make a huge move up and left to the cobble in the middle of the face. You know what to do from there.

I broke the starting hold in Sept '19 making the first move noticeably harder, hence the upgrade.
content.location:
The coordinates are: 41°09'32.0"N 105°20'17.9"W.

From

Building Blocks

, hike around the formation and walk NE for approximately 10 minutes, aiming for the right side of the 2nd obvious rock feature.

The problem lies perched on the edge of the slab.

content.description: Start on a stack of three cobbles on the right side of the dish which faces downhill. Go straight up the vertical face on more cobbles.
content.protection: A couple of pads, it's pretty tall.
content.location: After crossing the stream, head left and uphill straight towards the formation. This problem is on the really tall, scooped boulder covered in cobbles. It's pretty hard to miss.

content.description:
Do the same first move as

Hasselhoff Dyno

. Trend left, and make a nice little hop up to the other protruding cobble to finish!

Delightful.
content.protection: A spotter for the rock at the end.
content.location:
See the description for

Hasselhoff Dyno

.

content.description: Start matched on a very high crimp. Head straight up.
content.protection: A pad and a spotter to keep you off the tree.
content.location: Around the backside of the boulder containing Erotic States of Mind. Right next to the tree with the namesake strand of barbed wire hanging from it.

content.description: Begin on 2 obvious holds 7 feet off the ground. Campus to a crimp out right then to blocky hold, or campus directly up to the blocky hold. Fairly relaxed top out on jugs. Feet are minimal for the first few moves.
content.protection: Pad and spotter. Multiple pads to stack if you are shorter than 5'7".
content.location:
From the parking lot past the gate, follow the trail across the river, and head uphill about 200 yards.

Alternatively, follow the trail until you see obvious boulders on your left hand side. There exists a fainter climbers trail near the boulders. Back track along this trail until you see Building  Blocks on your right.
